title: MD
biography: K R Balakrishnan is an Indian cardiothoracic and heart transplant surgeon. He is the member of Indian Medical Association.
aiSummary: K. R. Balakrishnan is a heart transplant programs specialist with an H-index of 28 at MGM Healthcare (Member). Has been published in Advanced Science Letters, Journal of Vacuum Science & Technology B Microelectronics and Nanometer Structures Processing Measurement and Phenomena, Journal of Science Advanced Materials and Devices. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
